conditional_rules: IF descriptionType == 'manual' THEN SHOW parameter 'toolDescription'
IF resource == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF operation == 'copy' AND resource == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'fileId'
IF operation == 'copy' AND resource == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF operation == 'copy' AND resource == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'parentReference'
IF operation == 'delete' AND resource == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'fileId'
IF operation == 'download' AND resource == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'fileId'
IF operation == 'download' AND resource == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'binaryPropertyName'
IF operation == 'get' AND resource == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'fileId'
IF operation == 'rename' AND resource == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'itemId'
IF operation == 'rename' AND resource == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'newName'
IF operation == 'search' AND resource == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'query'
IF operation == 'share' AND resource == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'fileId'
IF operation == 'share' AND resource == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'type'
IF operation == 'share' AND resource == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'scope'
IF operation == 'upload' AND resource == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'fileName'
IF operation == 'upload' AND resource == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'parentId'
IF operation == 'upload' AND resource == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'binaryData'
IF binaryData == False AND operation == 'upload' AND resource == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'fileContent'
IF binaryData == True AND operation == 'upload' AND resource == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'binaryPropertyName'
IF resource == 'folder' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'folder' THEN SHOW parameter 'name'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'folder' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF operation IN ["delete", "getChildren"] AND resource == 'folder' THEN SHOW parameter 'folderId'
IF operation == 'rename' AND resource == 'folder' THEN SHOW parameter 'itemId'
IF operation == 'rename' AND resource == 'folder' THEN SHOW parameter 'newName'
IF operation == 'search' AND resource == 'folder' THEN SHOW parameter 'query'
IF operation == 'share' AND resource == 'folder' THEN SHOW parameter 'folderId'
IF operation == 'share' AND resource == 'folder' THEN SHOW parameter 'type'
IF operation == 'share' AND resource == 'folder' THEN SHOW parameter 'scope'
